snippet: A delegation from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said it had documented widespread irregularities in Wednesday’s vote, but other observers disagreed.
abstract: Prominent delegation of international election observers condemn Azerbaijan's presidential election as unfair and rife with fraud; government of Pres Ilham Aliyev, who won third year term with 84.6 percent of vote, deny accusations, claiming that election was legitimate.
lead_paragraph: A delegation from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said it had documented widespread irregularities in Wednesday’s vote, but other observers disagreed.

headline.main: Observers Differ on Fairness of Election in Azerbaijan
headline.print_headline: Observers Differ on Fairness of Election in Azerbaijan

keywords.value: Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
